title: Drawing, "Design for a Cocktail Shaker", June, 1941
medium: Pen and black ink, graphite on cream tracing paper
markings: Stamp in black ink, center right: 74.
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink, lower center: SHAKER; in graphite:2/; in pen and black ink: DIAMETRE 10 cms/HAUTEUR 20 cms; lower right: JEAN PUIFORCAT/6.41.
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description: Cylindrical body drawn in plan and elevation. The curved surfaces of lid, shoulder and foot with reeded decoration. Top of the lid with a scalloped-edged plate. Rectangular spout attached to the left side of the body. Underdrawing in graphite of cocktail shaker in golden section.
